roleData.title: Vehicle Control Team Member
roleData.description: A developer of Team Swinburne FSAE autonomous car. Currently developing and integrating the car's pathfinding algorithm using computer vision, Python CV2, and is simulated/tested using the Robot Operating System (ROS).

roleData.title: Creative Director
roleData.description: Directed and storyboarded content creation for SCSA. Led the creative team and coordinated the division internally.

roleData.title: Creative Officer
roleData.description: Event photographer and videographer, responsible for capturing moments during SCSA events and activities.

roleData.title: Volunteer & Peer Mentor
roleData.description: Completed 60+ hours in assisting staff and students. Helped with operations and logistics. Mentored and guided commencing students with general and technical enquiries
